title: Inkscapetober Day 27: Spark
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 27:** Spark
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image Vivarium.png]]


**Subject:** Vivarium

**Commentary:** As if yesterday's coat of arms wasn't weird enough already... One of the most aparent facts about Vivarium is that he has ''a frankly odd obsession with lighthouses'', to quote his author page. So that's what the shield is about. I could have made it look more like an ordinary lighthouse, but I thought this to be more elegant. As for the supporters, I have chosen to include two omnious, mysterious and perhaps dangerous figures that are definitely not cultists, how could you possibly think that?

**How the prompt fits in:** Another advantage of using this design of lighthouse is that one can see the tiny spark that generates all the light and even shines further than the shield.

@@ @@
